dcterms:creator: S. Shen
V. van Beek
A. Iosup
dcterms:description: The Bitbrain dataset contains real traces of resource consumption metrics of business-critical workloads hosted on Bitbrain infrastructure, including logs of over 1000 VMs workload hosting on two types of machines. It provides workload information for each time-stamp (separated by 5 minutes) including the number of requested CPU cores, CPU usage in terms of MIPS, RAM requested with Network (receive/transmit) and Disk (read/write) bandwidth characteristics.
dcterms:title: Bitbrain Dataset
